owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retrySwapAndUnwrap(bytes,uint8,bytes32,b.details: User signs a message for retrying its request

retrySwapAndUnwrapRune(bytes,uint8,bytes.details: User signs a message for retrying its request

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFundsToSourceChain(bytes,uint8,b.details: This function is used for both failed BTC and Rune requests

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByOwner(addres.details: Owner can only set the relayer fee percentage

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraws tokens in the emergency case

handleV3AcrossMessage(address,uint256,ad.notice: Process requests coming from Ethereum (using Across V3)

retrySwapAndUnwrap(bytes,uint8,bytes32,b.notice: Retry to swap and unwrap tokens

retrySwapAndUnwrapRune(bytes,uint8,bytes.notice: Retry to swap and unwrap tokens

withdrawFundsToSourceChain(bytes,uint8,b.notice: Send back tokens to the source chain

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByOwner(addres.notice: Send back tokens to the source chain by owner
